description: This header file declares the exported API functions for the CCSP CWMP ACS Broker component, including factory functions, lifecycle management, object enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: CcspCwmpCreateAcsBroker
methods.description: Creates and returns an instance of the CCSP CWMP Acs Broker object.

methods.name: CcspCwmpAcsboCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the CCSP CWMP Acs Broker internal object.

methods.name: CcspCwmpAcsboRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the CCSP CWMP Acs Broker object instance.

methods.name: CcspCwmpAcsboEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects for the CCSP CWMP Acs Broker.

methods.name: CcspCwmpAcsboInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the CCSP CWMP Acs Broker object.
